title: Riverdale's Luke Perry episode was incredibly hard for the cast
text:
Johannesburg – Riverdale's Luke Perry tribute episode was incredibly hard for the cast.

The show's creator, Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa revealed in June that the season 4 premiere would pay tribute to the actor who died in March at the age of 52 after suffering a stroke.

"We knew it was going to be hard and it was," Aguirre-Sacasa said in a Q&A session at a screening of the episode, adding that the episode is cathartic for fans of the show.

According to TV Line, the episode will see the show set aside its regular "over-the-top" plotlines and instead focus on the tragedy of losing Perry.

Compiled by Nikita Coetzee (Sources: Channel24, TV Line)
description: The show's creator, Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa previously revealed that the season 4 premiere would pay tribute to the actor who died at the age of 52 after suffering a stroke.
